description: With its basic layout unchanged for more than two decades, the Talorcan has seen only minor technical revisions since its introduction by JSDD. Originally intended as an escort vessel for diplomatic missions, the Albion Energy Subsidiary acquired the design plans for this type of vessel to serve on a number of different tasks. Though still used as an escort for larger ships, its frequently sent on scouting and reconnaissance missions, used for scientific observations, and at times, as a means of fast transportation for high ranking officials of the firm.
name: Talorcan
